name: hbex
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s1, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wex(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s1, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, wex(s0, w0))

|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s1, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wnf(s1, w0)

|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wal(s1, wex(s0, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))

comment: If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` , it is not free in ` E. y ph ` . (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1993.) Reduce symbol count in ~ nfex , ~ hbex . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 16-Oct-2021.)
